revision.text: Possibly: Essays on the microscope; containing a practical description of the most improved microscopes..., by George Adams. (London : Printed for the Author, by Robert Hindmarsh, Printer to His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales, No. 32, Clerkenwell-Close; and Sold by the Author, at his Shop, Tycho Brahe's Head, No. 60, Fleet-Street, M.DCC.LXXXVII. [1787]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2513811~S1
